wikipedia_page.main:
Will Nicholls is a professional wildlife cameraman and wildlife photographer from Northumberland in the United  Kingdom.
He has been awarded Young British Wildlife Photographer of the Year at the British Wildlife Photography Awards and overall winner at the RSPCA Young Photographer Awards.

link_mentions.page: Royal Grammar School, Newcastle upon Tyne

response: Every year Haydon Bridge now has a Summer Exhibition held in the community centre. This displays work of artists and photographers local to the village such as Elaine Westall and wildlife photographer Will Nicholls. This event is usually held in June or July.
* Will Nicholls (born 1995), British photographer and film-maker
